item.title: We beg you to please not have any outdoor fires at this time
item.description: We beg you to please not have any outdoor fires at this time. The lack of rain has cause the woods to be a tinder box.

item.title: Due to the recent outbreak of the new strain of the Covid 19
item.description: Due to the recent outbreak of the new strain of the Covid 19 virus, within the County, as a precaution, the Wirt County Commission has decided to close the Courthouse on Friday, August 16th, 2024. This will allow time for the necessary sanitation of the building.We hope to be back open on Monday. Please be safe, wash your hands often and stay hydrated.

item.title: While there is no current burn ban in place, we ask everyone
item.description: While there is no current burn ban in place, we ask everyone to refrain from outdoor fires at this time. As you can see from the map, we are in a pretty severe drought and it would not take much for a brush fire to start. If you must burn, please have a ring around your fire and a good water source for extinguishment. Several counties in our area have already experienced brush fires so please do your part and help prevent forest fires.
